casebody.data:
DESERT AIRE WELLNESS, LLC, a Nevada limited liability company, Appellant/Cross-Respondent,
v.
GB SCIENCES, LLC, a Nevada limited liability company, Respondent/Cross-Appellant,
and
The State of Nevada, Division of Public and Behavioral Health, Department of Health and Human Services, Respondent. No. 70462 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED APRIL 27, 2018

REVERSED. REMAND.
